About the Company:

Grant Cardone Enterprises (GCE) is the world leader in education, consulting, and management for small businesses around the world. Founded by renowned business expert, Grant Cardone, Grant Cardone Enterprise has helped small businesses grow and scale for over 30 years. Cardone's strategies are taught through online programs, workshops, one-on-one coaching, and large scale events.

Thanks to his 3 decade track record helping over 2 million businesses 10X their revenues, the Grant Cardone Enterprises empire now spans Business Education, Investment, Private Equity, Philanthropy, and Technology Development.

Are you a dynamic and results-driven individual with a passion for sales, business, and personal development coaching? We're on the hunt for an impactful Grant Cardone Sales Training Facilitator and Coach to lead impactful virtual training sessions with businesses and sales teams who have recently enrolled in Cardone University.

Your mission: Inspire and empower our Cardone University clients to achieve greater sales success through weekly coaching calls.

This is full-time onsite Monday to Friday 8:20am to 6pm in Aventura, FL - No remote options
• * High earning potential, base plus commissions**

Qualifications and Attributes:
• Sales Success: A proven track record of exceeding sales targets. This is a requirement.
• Communication: Clear, effective communicator, verbally and in writing—with the ability to be persuasive
• Motivation: The talent to inspire and boost the confidence of sales professionals.
• Adaptability: Adjust coaching methods to different industries and audiences.
• Positive Attitude: Maintaining an optimistic outlook for successful coaching.
• Continuous Learning: Maintain a state of learning, not a state of knowing.
• Strong Work Ethic: A commitment to putting in extra effort to help sales teams succeed.
• Customer Focus: Prioritizing customer value and understanding their perspective.
• Patience: Working with individuals at various skill levels.
• Results-Driven: Focus on achieving measurable improvements in sales performance.

Cardone Enterprises is an equal opportunity employer. All aspects of employment including the decision to hire, promote, discipline, or discharge, will be based on merit, competence, performance, and business needs. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, marital status, age, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, pregnancy, genetic information, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other status protected under federal, state, or local law.

Hours : Monday through Friday 8:20am-6pm, with Overtime requirements on some weekends for events.
